voiceChannelOnly: You need to be in a voice channel in order to do that.
sameVoiceChannelOnly: You need to be in the same voice channel as me in order to do that
guildOnly: This can only be done in servers.
notEnoughMoney: You don't have enough money for that
serverOwnerOnly: You need to be the server owner in order to do that
developerOnly: Only the bot developers can do that
missingOnePermission: You need the {{permission}} permission in order to do that.
missingMultiplePermissions: You need the {{permission}} permissions in order to do that.
cooldown: Woah! Slow down buddy! You're going too fast, you need to wait!
missingParameters: You need to give me parameters!
nsfwOnly: This can only be done in channels marked as NSFW.
noSentence: You need to give me a sentence.
mathEvaluationError: An error occurred while evaluating the math expression
invalidNumber: You need to give me a valid number.
invalidUser: You need to give me a valid user.
invalidUserBot: You need to give me a user that isn't a bot.
invalidUserNotBot: You need to give me a user that is a bot.
databaseOnly: Sorry, I don't have a database connection right now!
playerManagerOnly: Sorry, I don't have a player connection right now!
invalidColor: You need to give me a valid color.
invalidGuild: You need to give me a valid guild.
